p: L. tigris Chon S. Tan mushroom sclerotium was collected from a tropical forest in Lata Iskandar (4°17.46′N101°34.41′E), Pahang, Malaysia ( Tan, Ng & Tan, 2013). The sclerotium specimen was deposited (K(M) 177826) at Mycological Herbarium, Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew (Richmond, London, UK). L. tigris sclerotium (Ligno TG-K) was cultivated by Ligno Biotech. Sdn. Bhd. (Selangor, Malaysia) and each batch of Ligno TG-K was verified by DNA barcode marker targeting the internal transcribed spacer (ITS) region ( Kong et al., 2016b; Yap et al., 2014c). Freeze dried Ligno TG-K powder used in this study was provided by Ligno Biotech.
